content: परिधिः {@--1@} A wall, fence, hedge, anything surrounding or enclosing another. {@--2@} A misty halo round the sun or moon; परिधेर्मुक्त इवोष्णदीधितिः <ls>R. 8. 30</ls>; शशिपरिधिरिवोच्चैर्मंडलस्तेन तेने <ls>N. 2. 108.</ls> {@--3@} A circle of light {@--4@} The horizon. {@--5@} The circumference or compass in general. {@--6@} The circumference of a circle. {@--7@} The periphery of a wheel. {@--8@} A stick (of a sacred tree like पलाश) laid round the sacrificial fire; सप्तास्यासन् परिधयः त्रिःसप्त समिधः कृताः <ls>Rv. 10. 90. 15.</ls> {@--9@} A circle surrounding the globe. {@--10@} Epicycle. {@--11@} A covering. {@--12@} A branch of a sacred tree to which the sacrificial victim is tied.
